Sentencas: Ethylene epoxidation is an important reaction forming ethylene oxide (EO), which is a precursor to many other critical chemicals.
Titulo: Short Term Silver Electrode Microstructure Changes Under Epoxidation Conditions for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: This study links short-term EO production to the effects on the microstructure of Ag/yttria-stabilized zirconia cells with and without electrochemical promotion of catalysis (EPOC).
Titulo: Short Term Silver Electrode Microstructure Changes Under Epoxidation Conditions for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: Nano-scale features, called striations, were observed on the silver under all epoxidation reaction conditions tested, using a scanning electron microscope.
Titulo: Short Term Silver Electrode Microstructure Changes Under Epoxidation Conditions for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: While appearing in both cases, the striations for the EPOC case are finer in size (similar to 150 to 250 nm) compared to the no current case (similar to 400 to 500 nm).
Titulo: Short Term Silver Electrode Microstructure Changes Under Epoxidation Conditions for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: These features did not appear when epoxidation conditions were not present.
Titulo: Short Term Silver Electrode Microstructure Changes Under Epoxidation Conditions for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: Striation formation was further linked to the epoxidation reaction through electrochemical impedance spectroscopy and gas chromatography.
Titulo: Short Term Silver Electrode Microstructure Changes Under Epoxidation Conditions for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: Ethylene conversion to EO declines over the course of hours as striations form, indicating that striations have a negative influence on the reaction.
Titulo: Short Term Silver Electrode Microstructure Changes Under Epoxidation Conditions for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: Distribution of relaxation times was performed to determine the effect striation formation has on the electrochemical performance of the cells.
Titulo: Short Term Silver Electrode Microstructure Changes Under Epoxidation Conditions for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells

Sentencas: It was observed that the low-frequency peaks in the DRT analysis significantly decrease as striations formed over the course of 10 h.
Titulo: Short Term Silver Electrode Microstructure Changes Under Epoxidation Conditions for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells
